body_html:
Since the NGINX workaround seems sufficient, I'm going to close this one out.

Please note that we're planning to productionize TensorBoard. Things like CORS will be part of our configuration scripts. Please follow tensorflow/tensorboard#92 for more information.

With that said, I'm going to close this one out. If anyone feel strongly that header customization or CORS should be part of TensorBoard core, let me know.

body:
Since the NGINX workaround seems sufficient, I'm going to close this one out.

Please note that we're planning to productionize TensorBoard. Things like CORS will be part of our configuration scripts. Please follow https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorboard/issues/92 for more information.

With that said, I'm going to close this one out. If anyone feel strongly that header customization or CORS should be part of TensorBoard core, let me know.
